concept.title: Getting Started with Micro Cloud VM
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes running the VM as a micro cloud. To get started with building a cluster, see Cluster Setup.

conbody.p: By default, the VM starts as a single-node micro cloud with a base set of roles already running and ready to use. You can use this VM to test pushing applications still in development. If your application deploys successfully to an micro cloud, it will deploy to any PaaS of the same version. The application hosting environment is the same in all aspects except scale.
